item.title: Become URDF Wizard
item.description:
Key Notes

AuRoClean™ is an Acronym for “Autonomous Robot for Cleaning”, Initially made in collaboration with BARC in ROS(1) framework, with minimal Autonomous Behaviour[^1]. Current version of AuRoClean™ is developed on the ROS2 middleware with Nav2 and slam_toolbox for complete autonomous operation of the robot.
